strings.string: Please check xbmcblog.com for more information
Please approve xbTweet on the following screen.
Please set Twitter account credentials[CR]in the script's settings.
xbTweet failed to authenticate you.[CR]Please check the script's settings
xbTweet failed to authenticate you.[CR]Please approve xbTweet on the following screen.
Automatically Tweet Music I'm Listening To
Follow The Author of This Script
Allow xbTweet to run in background
Tweet only after I watched this percentage of the video
Tweet only after I played this percentage of the song
Tweet only if playing a library item
You recently upgraded your version, it's important that
you review the script settings. xbTweet will exit now.
Show 'What's New?' after downloading a new version
Check twitter for new updates every (minutes)
Show in-play notifications of my timeline
Show notification when I receive a direct message
Use a different account for incoming notifications

You have selected the option of 'plain text' as the authentication method with Twitter.[CR]But xbTweet failed to locate your username and password.[CR]Please use the next page in order to enter these values, you can always return to it by opening it from the scripts page.[CR][CR]See you back shortly :)
The login credentials you provided for Twitter are incorrect.[CR]please correct your username/password on the next page and run the script again.

xbTweet failed to authenticate with Twitter.[CR][CR]But not to worry, just approve xbTweet on the next page and everything will work just fine.[CR]After approving xbTweet you'll be given a PIN number which you'll need to enter back in xbTweet.[CR][CR]See you back soon :)
The PIN number you entered is incorrect.[CR]please run the script again and give it another try.
Did you encounter a problem obtaining a PIN?[CR][CR]Checkout the wiki on xbtweet.googlecode.com for more info.

You have selected the option of 'OAuth' as the authentication method with Twitter.[CR][CR]Please approve xbTweet on the next page and enter the PIN number which you'll be given at the end of the approval process.[CR][CR]See you back soon :)
An unexpected Twitter authentication issue as occured.[CR][CR]Please report it at xbtweet.googlecode.com.[CR][CR]Sincere apologies
